trans-unit.source: Represents a specialized text run that can be used to modify properties of text runs within its scope.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个专用文本运行，可以使用它在其范围内修改文本运行属性。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier> extends to the next matching <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> text run, or to the next <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>.
trans-unit.target: 作用域<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>可扩展到下一步匹配<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment>文本，或运行到下一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfParagraph>。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier> objects can be nested.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> 类的新实例。
一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> specifies the direction of content flow for text and user interface (UI) elements, and can be either <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection.LeftToRight> or <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection> 指定的内容流方向，文本和用户界面 (UI) 元素，并可以是<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection.LeftToRight>或<xref:System.Windows.FlowDirection.RightToLeft>。

trans-unit.source: This value is ignored unless the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.HasDirectionalEmbedding%2A> property returns `true`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> supports <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> for the current scope of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> 是否支持当前文本范围的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> supports <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" /> for the current scope of text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> 支持当前文本范围的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FlowDirection" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the return value is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A> property to determine the direction of content flow for the current scope of text.
trans-unit.target: 返回值时`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.FlowDirection%2A>属性来确定当前范围的文本的内容流的方向。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> for a text run, or the return value of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.ModifyProperties(System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties)" /> for a nested text modifier.
trans-unit.target: 文本运行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" />，或嵌套文本修饰符的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier.ModifyProperties(System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties)" /> 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> for a text run.

The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> to be used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" />, subject to further modification by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> objects at outer scopes.
trans-unit.target: 要由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 使用的实际 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" />，可由外部范围中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier" /> 对象进行进一步的修改。
